The HTTP method used to send the body to the given address. Either “POST”, “PUT” (optionally more) If the method is not supported or not supported by the server for the given address, the rule is deactivated (error code 5)

- JSON string to be send to the local CLIP resource. The rule is deactivated if body is not accepted by the resource. (error code 6) - JSON string to be send to the portal. - A free format string send to an intranet server

Parameter.Name: address
Parameter.Abstract: The address to the bridge resource (attribute)

Parameter.Name: operator
Parameter.Abstract: The operator to use on the attribute
